Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Sign up for the half term events in Sunday 14th of February so sign up now, reserve your space and don't miss out!
What's more... by getting involved in ANY of the workshops or sessions ... you will get a FREE priority entry ticket to our #NCSActionDay Gig!
A HUGE celebration event for 500 graduates from across London to say well done for all the amazing things you have done during and since NCS.
Full line up of DJ's, partners and special guests will be released next week. Be the first to know...
